posts.post_title: N43 wanted - Barry, Clark, Cummings, Ford, Myers, Ray
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy or trade for the following, prefer ungraded with decent front, back damage OK and open to anything that is not high graded slabbed card. Thanks.

N43 Allen & Ginter – Barry, Clark, Cummings, Ford, Myers, Ray

historical note on Ford: [url]http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malcolm_Webster_Ford[/url]
